question: 検問する
sourceAnswer: To Inspect, To Examine, To Check
activeAnswer: To Inspect, To Examine, To Check
sourceMnemonic: You <kanji>examine</kanji> the <kanji>problem</kanji>. In order to do this, you need <vocabulary>to inspect</vocabulary> it or <vocabulary>to examine</vocabulary> it. And if you're inspecting people like this, you're probably the police.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
